1011011101001001 0100000010110101 0 -> sum: 1111011111111110, cout: 0
1001001000000011 0010111000100110 0 -> sum: 1100000000101001, cout: 0
1001010000000110 1110010101011010 0 -> sum: 0111100101100000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
